attributes.10: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, the whole scene does not occur in the books. However, the trick with the coin Arya uses on the soldier is based on the way she tricks and kills a guard when she flees Harrenhal after the castle is seize by the Northern army led by Roose Bolton. Also, Arya stabs the Tickler multiple times, but that happens later in the book.==References==ReflistCategory:CharactersCategory:Season 3 CharactersCategory:Minor CharactersCategory:House FreyCategory:Characters from the RiverlandsCategory:Unnamed CharactersCategory:Status: DeadCategory:Smallfolk
attributes.death: Stabbed to death by Arya Stark
attributes.title: Frey Soldier 1

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the whole scene does not occur in the books. However, the trick with the coin Arya uses on the soldier is based on the way she tricks and kills a guard when she flees [[Harrenhal]] after the castle is seize by the Northern army led by [[Roose Bolton]]. Also, Arya stabs [[the Tickler]] multiple times, but that happens later in the book.
